SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Bishop
The Bishop class extends ChessPiece and represents a bishop chess piece with a specified color.
Chess
The `Chess` class represents a chess game with a board, pieces, and methods for initializing the board, moving pieces, and checking for valid moves.
ChessBoard
The `ChessBoard` class represents a chess board with pieces initialized in their starting positions.
ChessPiece
The abstract class `ChessPiece` represents a chess piece with color and type properties, providing methods to calculate possible moves and retrieve color and type information.
ConsoleChessBoard
The `ConsoleChessBoard` class extends `ChessBoard` and provides a method to display the chess board in the console with pieces represented by characters.
ConsoleGame
The `Game` class represents a chess game with functionality for player moves, check, and checkmate detection.
Game
The `Game` class represents a chess game with functionality for player moves, check, and checkmate detection.
GUIChessBoard
 
GUIGame
The `Game` class represents a chess game with functionality for player moves, check, and checkmate detection.
King
The King class extends ChessPiece and represents a king piece in chess with a specified color.
Knight
The Knight class represents a knight chess piece with a specific color.
Pawn
The Pawn class extends ChessPiece and represents a pawn chess piece with a specified color.
PieceColor
The `PieceColor` enumeration is used to represent the color of a chess piece, which can be either black or white.
PieceMove
The PieceMove class represents a move from one PiecePosition to another in a game.
PiecePosition
The PiecePosition class represents the position of a piece on a board using row and column coordinates.
PiecePositionColumn
This enumeration represents the columns on a chessboard, with each enum constant representing a column from A to H.
PiecePositionRow
This enumeration represents the rows on a chessboard, with each enum constant representing a row from 1 to 8.
PieceType
The `PieceType` enum consists of the following constants: `None`, `Pawn`, `Rook`, `Knight`, `Bishop`, `Queen`, and `King` that represent a type of chess piece.
Player
The Player class represents a player in a game with a name and a piece color.
Queen
The Queen class extends ChessPiece and represents a queen chess piece with a specified color.
Rook
The Rook class extends ChessPiece and represents a rook piece in chess with a specified color.
